summary: The implementation successfully delivers the SkelMsg real-time messaging feature with all core requirements met. Backend message storage, conversation partner retrieval, and frontend UI components (conversation list, chat thread, message input, video link picker) are implemented. React Query polling (3-second refetchInterval) is configured for real-time updates. The messaging interface is accessible via a MessageCircle icon in the main header navigation. All features require Internet Identity authentication. However, some minor evidence gaps exist due to truncated diff content.
